message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable product. I think you'll really love it, but I also want to make sure you know that I have another interested buyer who is willing to pay $1500000 for it. With that in mind, I'm willing to offer it to you for $1400000. This is a great deal, and I think you won't find a better price anywhere else. What do you say?
